utterances.transcript: And the rest of your rides would be from Little India %uh down to- if you want to go to Chinatown, it's two stops.

utterances.transcript: Okay.

utterances.transcript: And your bus system also has- %uh does it follow a strict schedule?

utterances.transcript: It follows a strict schedule but we can't control the traffic.

utterances.speaker: Guide
utterances.transcript: So the traffic- if there is a build-up of traffic, then there would be a delay.

utterances.transcript: %Hm sometimes we grumble because the same bus number comes- two of the buses come together.

utterances.transcript: Okay.

utterances.transcript: %Uh they would publicize it that they would extend it maybe for an hour or two.

utterances.speaker: Guide
utterances.transcript: Because they know a lot of people need to get home and so they need to provide the %uh transportation.

utterances.speaker: Guide
utterances.transcript: We also have a night rider system where the buses bring people from areas like %uh Chinatown, %uh the night clubbing areas back into the major cities.

utterances.speaker: Guide

utterances.transcript: Okay.
